sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Diplomatic tensions rise as all three Baltic states recall their ambassadors from Moscow and order their Russian counterparts to leave.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The UN is worried a decline in reported cases of human trafficking may be masking the real extent of the problem.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Heavy snowfall and disruption hit parts of Europe, with Mallorca seeing its heaviest snowfall recorded in five years.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Diplomatic tensions are increasing over Ukraine between Russia and the Baltic states,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: where all three have announced they're recalling their ambassadors from Moscow.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: They're also expelling Russian ambassadors from their own countries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: They are also expelling Russian ambassadors from their own countries. Russia's ambassador to Latvia says he's been told to leave Riga a day before the first anniversary of the invasion.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: We are leaving.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Latvia is reducing the level of diplomatic relations between our countries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: I have to leave the country by February 23rd.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: That's all.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Latvia's decision follows similar announcements from Lithuania and Estonia over Russia's aggression in Ukraine. Moscow accuses the Estonian leadership of being Russophobic and has asked Estonia's ambassador to leave Moscow by February 7th.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov has met with his counterpart in Pretoria, South Africa, a visit that sparked criticism against the backdrop of the war.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: South Africa insists it remains neutral over the conflict, but its main opposition, Democratic Alliance Party, accuses the ruling party, the African National Congress, of sliding towards support for Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: However, South Africa's foreign minister, Naledi Pandor, has urged a diplomatic solution to the conflict.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The heaviest snowfall recorded in Mallorca in the last five years fell on Monday. That's

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: according to experts who say the coldest temperatures were recorded in the early hours of the morning in the Tramontana Mountains, at minus 2.4 degrees Celsius.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The Palma Met Office says as much as 10 centimetres of snow will fall on Wednesday and it's forecast to fall on lower ground as well.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Over in Italy, several regions have been put on an extreme weather alert with a wave of freezing conditions, heavy snow and powerful winds hitting the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The Marque region and parts of Emilia-Romagna in the north of the country are on orange alert, meaning that the weather poses a danger to people and property.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: A snowstorm hampered traffic on a key highway in Slovenia and left parts of the country temporarily without electricity.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: In Croatia, snow and strong winds also caused traffic problems on the Adriatic coast and in the mountains.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The bad weather left many islands cut off from the mainland.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: And in Austria's Carinthia, heavy snow caused power outages, closed roads and shut schools.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Around 5,000 households were left without electricity and 250 fire brigades were called out in the area.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: While the risk of avalanches heightened, the increased snow means the winter season for skiers should be secured until Easter.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: should be secured until Easter.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: This huge iceberg, measuring 1,550 metres square, that's almost the size of Greater London, has broken off from the Antarctica Brunt ice shelf.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Cracks in the 150-metre thick ice have been developing over several years, and the final break happened on Sunday evening during a spring tide. The British Antarctic Survey say this is a natural and normal process and won't add to the sea level rise.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The floating lump of ice will be named by the US National Ice Centre.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: New Zealand's outgoing Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern insists she's grateful for her time in office, despite a barrage of negative comments in the wake of her shock resignation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: She wore a traditional Maori cloak on her last official appearance as Prime Minister in Ratana, near Whanganui.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: I've experienced such love, compassion, empathy and kindness when I've been in this job.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: That has been my predominant experience.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: So I leave feeling gratitude for having this wonderful role for so many years.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: At least seven more people have been killed

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: in another mass shooting incident in California.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Officials said they died in related attacks on workers at two agricultural facilities in the coastal community of Half Moon Bay, south of San Francisco.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Police in San Mateo County say they arrested 67-year-old Chun-Li Zhao, who they suspect of carrying out the killings at both sites. They said a weapon was found in his vehicle and they believe he acted alone.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: One of the ten people injured in a mass shooting at a dance studio in Monterey Park in California at the weekend has died, bringing the number of dead to 11.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: As police continue with their investigation, they say they've discovered items of interest after a search of the 72-year-old suspect's residence.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: We recovered one.308 caliber rifle, numerous electronic devices such as cell phones, computers, etc.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Items that lead us to believe the suspect was manufacturing homemade firearm suppressors. From the Monterey Park scene where the victims were assassinated, investigators recovered a total of 42 shell casings and a large capacity magazine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: It's still unclear exactly what Hukan Tran'sotive was for the killings, but California Governor Gavin Newsom said America is not dealing with the issue of guns.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: But respectfully I will submit that regardless of the challenges that relates to behavioral health, there's not a country in the world that doesn't experience behavioral health issues.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: It's not unique to the United States, quite the contrary. What's unique is these large capacity magazine clips that will take down every single one of you in a matter of seconds.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The UN is concerned that the pandemic may have helped to mask the extent of human trafficking.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Registered cases of the crime dropped significantly during the health crisis, but experts in the field think it could be that such crimes as trafficking, prostitution and forced labour are moving deeper underground to avoid prosecution.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: There was an explosion of online sexual exploitation and a a number of countries, basically, their justice and policy system simply stopped working during the pandemic.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: They had to divert resources to other purposes to maintain public health.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: 11% fewer worldwide cases of human trafficking were detected in 2020 compared to the previous year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The differences between rich and poor regions are also stark.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: While the numbers were halved in East Asia and North Africa, they rose in Europe and North America, where, according to the UN, more investigators and resources were available.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The UN is concerned that the decline in the number of detected cases for the first time in 20 years may become the norm. They say it doesn't mean it's not happening, it's just getting more difficult to uncover. During the pandemic, traffickers took advantage of the crisis to expand their criminal structures undetected.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The numbers have decreased so significantly that if we ever want to have real chances in eradicating this crime, we have to think differently.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Our correspondent says that the UN believes countries have to beat traffickers at their own game, given that the crime is increasingly carried out via the internet.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Investigators should also take more action online, with the hope that in the future, fewer registered cases will also mean fewer actual cases.
